references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models which underpins many modern image generation techniques.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This work demonstrated the superiority of diffusion models over GANs for image generation, marking a significant advancement and shifting focus towards diffusion models in the field.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced a significant improvement to diffusion models by utilizing a latent space for generation, enabling high-resolution image synthesis with improved efficiency and quality.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper integrated CLIP for text-to-image generation, leveraging the power of natural language conditioning in diffusion models for more semantically aligned and creative image generation.

references.paper_title: How I Warped Your Noise: a temporally-correlated noise prior for diffusion models
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the problem of temporal consistency in video generation using diffusion models, a key challenge tackled in the target paper and a significant contribution to the field of video generation.
